website_summaries.verdict: The MacBook Air remains an excellent ultraportable choice for students and other macOS fans with basic computing needs, but despite killer battery life, it will disappoint power users with its low-resolution display and outdated processor.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Wonder why you are paying less here than buying direct from Apple?
customer_reviews.text: I paid about $100 less for a NEW never opened Apple MacBook Air computer from "Electro Express" on Amazon than I would have if I went to Apple directly. The problem is that it broke 8 months after I bought it. No problem right? Apple products have a 12 month warranty. True. The problem is that these re-sellers have old computers. Apple starts the warranty clock when "they" get them which in my case was 14 months ago. So basically I bought a computer with a 6 month warranty. Long story short: the repair is $475 and "Electro Express won't return my emails. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not 100 % Brand New
customer_reviews.text: The box was sealed but i contact Apple to validate the MacBook purchase they tell me warranty don’t cover the 12 months because was not new and now i have only 189 days left of warranty from apple.. I pay for new i got something not brand new
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to get rid of Windows?!?
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely hesitant to buy this MacBook Air because of the negative reviews about refurbished units, but I am so glad I did. I received a BRAND NEW MacBook Air, exactly as described. It was delivered in the original box and according to Apple, was a brand new unit. It booted up without issue, ran smoothly and quietly, and worked perfectly when syncing to my iPhone and Apple Watch. I had no issues whatsoever and would recommend you take the leap and purchase this laptop without a second thought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I was really skeptical about ordering a new MacBook off of anything besides Apple or Best Buy but now I don’t regret one thing! The laptop came brand new wrapped by apple, which was nice to know! The laptop works very well and was in pristine condition!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon T Morgan

customer_reviews.title: One of the best laptops
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Apple laptop and it is a good one. Seems to last forever on the battery, quick and very functional. A little while getting used to it (versus Windows), but all-in-all a great piece of machinery. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Leinbach

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it is used
customer_reviews.text: This is not a brand new laptop. There are clear used marks on the laptop!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: If you want refurbished, this is the product for you
customer_reviews.text: Got this computer and I could not even get it through the setup stage. The bottom was scratched. I did not order a refurbished product, but that is what I received!
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA LABORE

customer_reviews.title: Computer not cleaned out
customer_reviews.text: There are still games and other programs from past user. I do not u derstand why these are on and do not know how to delete them!
customer_reviews.author: Jill johnson

customer_reviews.title: misleading
customer_reviews.text: This is a 2017 computer, not the latest version. Misleading. Spend $100 more and go to the Apple store with a student. I cannot speak for battery life or anything else as my son opened the box, gave me a password and then I saw it was not a newer computer. Yes, it's new, in box, but an old version. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa P.

customer_reviews.title: The specs on the website are different from the specs on the computer
customer_reviews.text: When I decided to order my MacBook Air I decided to do so based on the fact that it was specified to have 8gb of memory ram. Upon further inspection of my Mac a few weeks later, I come to find that it only has 4gb of ram installed. I certainly would not have purhased this product for the agreed upon price if i wouldve had this information at the time of purchase. I hope that the seller reaches out to me to fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: brandon waugerman

customer_reviews.title: Worth EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: Brand new laptop and I was able to get it for 649.99. For an apple laptop this is AMAZING! Brand new but an older version (2017) runs amazing. I am so grateful I was able to snag this deal!! I’ve had MacBooks for 10 plus years and every time I paid over 1000 dollars. I’m so grateful for my purchase and I highly recommend!! Amazing for college students :)
customer_reviews.author: Bianca  Moreira

customer_reviews.title: One year of warranty verified and $699 was a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back around Prime Day (July) 2019 for $699 plus tax. My main feedback is that after receiving this, I checked the warranty and I did in fact have one year from my purchase date, so Amazon seems to have resolved the main complain on this product page, although your mileage may vary. The specs have been mentioned by others; yes, it is an old model pre-Retina display, but I found this great for word processing, streaming video, etc. My work still uses these and it is now the end of 2019 as I write this.
customer_reviews.author: Lenroy

customer_reviews.title: Software issues
customer_reviews.text: Has had problems since it was purchased with shutting down and staying connected with internet
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: It is NEW
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about purchasing this after reading negative reviews, however this MacBook Air is brand new. It is a 2017 model. After starting it up, I was able to download the newest OS MAC OS Catalina Mojave. My husband has the same one and he paid much more for it. It came packaged extremely well. The main box containing the PC was sealed, never opened. The computer runs beautifully. All accessories are new and were also packaged beautifully, just as if I had purchased at the Apple store. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TDShop

customer_reviews.title: Livid..
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to find out what was inside of the package when getting my MacBook.. SMH. I won’t say but buyers beware..
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rose

customer_reviews.title: Upset with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop for my teen to use for school work. It was sent back to apple after 4 months for a warranty repair due to a malfunctioning screen. We received it back quick, but the screen has gone blank again after 3 weeks. Very disappointed. Repaired 3 times. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schaal

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I called Apple and gave the serial number on the box. They couldn’t find it. Sending back ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: jessssssika

customer_reviews.title: This is the same computer I bought in 2013!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this Laptop. I didn’t realize it is the exact same model I bought in 2013! Even a $300 discount wasn’t a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto G Perez

customer_reviews.title: This computer is beyond amazing. I have been able to do so much ...
customer_reviews.text: This computer is beyond amazing. I have been able to do so much with it. I love how it syncs to my phone and watch. And my documents are easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Angee Worth

customer_reviews.title: No storage space
customer_reviews.text: Horrible storage, horrible experience, Horrible. I cannot return or exchange cannot use for my buisness. I hate it
customer_reviews.author: MIKE P.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the os update
customer_reviews.text: Hardware wise the device works great but I had some challenges after it did an update. ITunes stopped functioning so I had to reinstall the os. After reinstallation the tutorial had some glitches so I had to abandon that and just use my intuition to figure stuff out. This is my first mac book air. I usually use a pc. Apart from the few software issues at the beginning it has been smooth sailing from that point on.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Baptiste

customer_reviews.title: As described with 1 yr manufactures warrenty
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on Prime Day. Exactly what I was expecting. Verified with Apple Customer service that there is a valid 1 year warranty, the date is a little off which is based on Amazons date of purchase 6/25/19. But I'll take that. Note that you can only purchase extend warranty within 60 days of purchade date. That means Amazons purchase date, not the date you purchase this item. Great Buy, fantastic deal. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TANYA PIVOVAROFF

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Air 13-inch (2017)
customer_reviews.text: Not happy that this arrived and then I discovered it is a 2017 MacBook Air. Nothing in the sales copy indicated that it was a 2017 model. I knew it wasn't Retina display, but, even if it was sitting on a shelf for 2+ years, it does not have the bells & whistles of the newer (not latest) MacBook Air. It needed the Catalina upgrade, because Migration Assistant wouldn't work without the upgrade. I am upgrading from a 2010 MacBook Pro, and this seems sluggish by comparison. Lesson learned: Buy directly from the Apple website.
customer_reviews.author: R.J.

customer_reviews.title: My first laptop
customer_reviews.text: I've always have a desk top computer, but this is my first laptop and I love it. Its light and easy to use and I can take it to work with me and do work there. I did buy a mouse and I love that I can plug in the usb and use the mouse, or I can unplug it and sit on the couch and also use it there. Its very convenient, I can use my printer with it and it does all the same things the desktop did, but this one is so much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Sabol

customer_reviews.title: Good Macbook Air but it was damaged
customer_reviews.text: Last week, I ordered the Macbook Air 2017 and it arrived yesterday. I got home pretty late so I opened the box today. I was really excited but when I looked closely. There were marks and dents on the laptop. I took a picture to prove my summary.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: No Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good purchase. My computer is as scuffed up, and would not get pat the set-up language stage. I would not recommend !!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Eckard

customer_reviews.title: Old 2017 Model discontinued in 2018
customer_reviews.text: What they do not tell you in the description above is that this $700 Mac is a discontinued model since 2018 and technology is already 3 years old. Did not find this out until I opened the box. Very misleading. This is from Apple: “MQD32LL/A refers to the configuration with 128 GB of flash storage and MQD42LL/A refers to the configuration with 256 GB. MQD42LL/A was discontinued on October 30, 2018. **This model was introduced on June 5, 2017.”
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Brand New, 2017 Macbook Air at an Insane Price
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's the 2017 model. Yes I knew that ahead of time (it says *previous generation*) Mine was brand new -- in original packaging, all sealed & wrapped as expected. It is what it says it is, a great PC at a ridiculous price -- 50% less than my current phone. Buy them while you can.
customer_reviews.author: A guy in CA

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: This is the MacBook Air 2017. Still, I believe the price was perfectly acceptable for the laptop. Amazing form factor and big fan of the Air. Didn't need a brand-new laptop, just a small form-factor one for school, DND, and traveling. Computer warranty came verified the day it arrived at my house and I had an overall good experience with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Semiklose

customer_reviews.title: Very positive experience!
customer_reviews.text: I got brand new MacBook Air, in authentic box, sealed, never opened. I read all reviews before that purchase and was pretty scared to order, but I’m happy now. I also didn’t have any problems with registration on Apple website to prove my warranty and to pay for Apple protection plan.
customer_reviews.author: Veronika

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product description - be careful
customer_reviews.text: It is now late in 2019, yet this "new" mac air that I bought on sale is from 2017, which means that, among other things, it is subject to the awful crappy keyboard problem that was fixed on the macair only in 2019. Which is just what I wanted to avoid. It doesn't have any of the major recent features like Retina dispay or USB-C. It's labeled "Amazon Choice" or something like that. And it's nearly impossible to notice who is selling it, which turns out to be "Amazon Services", whoever that is. Maybe I'm just a dummy, which is entirely possible, but i feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: The best computer I've ever owned. It is light, powerful, easy to use, and does everything I need it to do. The battery life is fantastic. I've never gotten below 50% even though I use it for hours at a time. It has a lot of useful built-in apps such as Numbers. I couldn't be happier, great computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop working in less than 6 months unable to ask for warranty
customer_reviews.text: Stop working in less than 6 months unable to ask for warranty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! - Just as described. Had a small issue with tapping trackpad not responding. Press hold worked also used TAB and spacebar to navigate setup menus. Once into settings was able to adjust Trackpad to respond better to me. Once fully booted was texting like I was on my Cellphone. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Returning is VERY expensive. Total rip off.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop but ended up with 2 as I one as a gift. I returned this and when I purchased it - it had said free returns. Caution. Not free. I lost $150 on my refund. 20% of the purchase price. So much for prime deals and free returns. Total bait and switch. Be sure you want this before you order it. Because it’s a pricey return if not. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Go Blue Girl

customer_reviews.title: Apple MacBook Air (13-inch)-Died before Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a Apple MacBook off amazon as a Christmas gift to myself. The MacBook Air died before Christmas. I took the macbook to the Apple store to check out the issue and they concluded that the device would not start and therefore; I had to return my device for the full refund. Lesson learned...Purchase apple products directly from apple store to avoid any issue with newly purchased apple devices and purchase apple care for protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kemnetta Pillette

customer_reviews.title: Is able to run all of the adobe suite software!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my MacBook Air! I do photography and some design stuff on the side and was worried this computer would get bogged down with all the software I run at a time. I have the full adobe suite and use many of the programs at once and have had very minimal slowing of the computer. Premier Pro I would say has the most trouble but I was still edit and export all of my video! Apple in general is a great brand that produces high quality product so in my opinion you will never go wrong buying this computer!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: NOT LATEST MODEL - Not worth the cost. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: This is a June 2017 model with the old power button. Product description is deceiving - why would you retail a 2 year old product on “sale” at the same price as the latest model? Very disappointed. After going back to review the details, the model year is buried 2 pages down in the description.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas gikonyo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on discount on Black Friday for $650 and it was worth it! I was hesitant because of the reviews but this is a BRAND NEW computer. This older model appealed to me because it still offers USB ports (newer model does not). I needed a device for everyday browsing and some online work. Also, the one year Apple warranty started on the date I purchased and is valid through one year (confirmed by Apple). I would definitely recommend to anyone in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT turn on the file vault cause computer slowness and it won't charge
customer_reviews.text: The computer is working good. But had to take it to and ishop (great customer support) after turning on file vault (security feature to protect your files) After I turn on the file vault the computer was super slow and was not charging. Since I turn it off it has been working pretty good but I will update the review after using it a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Wade

customer_reviews.title: Best. Purchase. Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This MacBook is my best purchase I’ve made (yet)! Thin, but fast, as editing videos is as easy as 1, 2, 3! It has 8GB Ram, 121 SSD. I highly recommend this MacBook.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Jones

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I DO NOT RECOMMEND! This arrived new in box but didn’t work, laptop keeps freezing on the open screen to set it up where you select language... took to Apple store and they said it’s a hardware issue and will take 7-10 business days to fix. Tried to return it here to Amazon and was told that they would only swap it out but I would have to pay for another one and then when they get this one they’d check it out and see if I qualify for a full refund for the first one. Lesson learned, by Apple from the Apple store only!
customer_reviews.author: Aldon Martinez

customer_reviews.title: From a third party manufacturer but not Apple Store
customer_reviews.text: Be aware! It's 2017 mode, from a third party manufacturer but not Apple Store. Sound didn't work when received. Amazon customer service helped to reach to Apple Care for me, talked through phone & tried to shoot problems for hours. Failed.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: CHECK FACTORY SEAL!
customer_reviews.text: Please check your product upon recieval. Upon unboxing the item I realized that the factory seal was broken. Not only broken but broken carefully to look as if it were still intact. This item is listed as brand new. Very decietful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this deal
customer_reviews.text: Received this laptop pretty today (12/27/19) opened it up and started the set up-it just spun for 30 min on the WiFi connect part-I have Pretty good WiFi so no reason for this to happen. While I waitni Look up the serial number on this laptop and it is no joke a 2013 laptop 🤦‍♀️ Hence why it’s operating super slow and getting stuck-well it never came off of the WiFi connect part and just stayed frozen there. I am Returning this ancient thing and will just pay $300 more and get a brand new from the Apple store
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Its beautiful ♡ o ♡
customer_reviews.text: The item was in good condition and absolutely no scratches. Its actually a good buy and you will save a lot of money from the current apple laptop. It still does its job effectively and its super light despite of its size. Its very luxurious and the sound quality is loud and clear. The treble can be a bit weird but its still good sound quality. Its still a good laptop, the performance is super good, no lags, no glitches. And it lasts a long time. Battery life is excellent. This is worth buying in my opinion, i had no problems with it, just make sure to buy it from a reliable seller here because it makes a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Brand New Mac
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 Brand new Mac Airs from this company. They shipped fast and packaging was perfect. I called Apple (before opening the box) and they verified the serial numbers as all clear. 330 days left on the year warranty. We Saved $400 combined. Also, we were specifically looking for the Mac Air that was the previous model because the new revisions weren’t relevant enough for us spend the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING. I have wanted a MacBook for so long ...
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. I have wanted a MacBook for so long but wanted to wait until the purchase itself made sense for me. I was a little weary about purchasing online but after I read the other reviews I was sold. This laptop came brand new in the box, with all new accessories to go with, instructions, warranty info, and the setup itself was so simple. Super happy with my purchase, thanks amazon & apple!!
customer_reviews.author: Marla Scott

customer_reviews.title: A great deal and compromise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop during the Black Friday deal and it arrived brand new and sealed. I realized that it was the 2017 model, however it was an upgrade in speed from my 2011 MacBook Pro and far lighter. For my purposes (browsing the internet, documents), the price was right for staying with an Apple laptop and not breaking the bank unnecessarily. Would I have liked a brand new 2019 MacBook Pro? Absolutely. Did I want to spend double? No, it just didn't make sense for my purposes. This was a very economical way to stay with the Apple line and I absolutely am pleased with the deal - it was still half the price of my new iPhone!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Ugh, Apple.
customer_reviews.text: It was a screaming deal, so no harm there. I just really dislike setting up new Apple devices. It never goes smoothly. The tiny SSD was the bottle neck this time. This thing is replacing a nearly 10 y/o MacBook which had a 500 GB HDD in it. This Air comes with a 128 GB SSD. So you need an external drive, and then you need to default key user folders to that external drive. The setup/transfer process will not accommodate that shortcoming in any way. Nearly 10 year difference in tech, and the new drive is much smaller. Leave it to Apple to nickel and dime you.
customer_reviews.author: Boudewijn R.

customer_reviews.title: Product defective
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard had an entire bank of keys that did not function. THe computer locked and I was unable to get back into it. It is hard to believe this was a new apple product
customer_reviews.author: joseph braun

customer_reviews.title: Brand new and covered by Apple's 1-yr warranty
customer_reviews.text: I just picked up mine and it is a brand new product. I contacted Apple and they confirmed that it is covered by a 1-yr warranty just like any new product from Apple, regardless of the year of manufacturing. Given my experience I am very surprised that some of you found your warranty to be much shorter. Did someone sell you a used refurbished product? Any way, this sale is for a brand new Mac Book Air first introduced in 2017. As long as it is new in the box, Apple covers it for 1 yr, period.
customer_reviews.author: the-big-bend

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get this laptop on sale and so far so good. I will update review if I run into any problems. He was brand new
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pierre

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Air is very portable and convenient to use for travel.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop for travel, and it is very satisfactory. As a long time Mac user, I would never purchase this or any other Macintosh without also purchasing Apple Care. It needs to be used with a mouse to work best. if you do a lot of graphics, you might not get the same result as with a large screen desktop. I have no problem that there is no hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: ben g.

customer_reviews.title: 2017 model and defective
customer_reviews.text: Got new one on dec 6 2019. It was 2017 model And track pad not working. Returning back
customer_reviews.author: Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Angry
customer_reviews.text: This was my first ever Mac book so I had very high expectations first off the computer moves slow and sometimes glitches second the volume is way to low even when I turn it up and the space is very low also the battery life is low to it doesn’t last very long these are just some things I noticed I’ve only had the Mac for a couple weeks I haven’t dropped it so I’m pretty frustrated that I’m already having problems I am very unhappy with this
customer_reviews.author: JasonJr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer! So easy to set-up and use!!
customer_reviews.author: CoCo Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased mine on the Black Friday $650 deal. I was sort of hesitant, wondering if my product would come and have scratches or scuffs or any signs of use, since I bought it as a gift. Nope. It came vacuum sealed in an Apple box. I opened it before wrapping it for Christmas to make sure everything was ok. The laptop was gorgeous. Completely brand new. If it was refurbished, it showed ZERO signs. I think it wasn't refurbished, but just a year or two old stock from Apple. It is a gorgeous laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mellor

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews too. Trust me. You’re safe
customer_reviews.text: I read the other comments from 2018 and earlier. Those may have happened yes, but based off 300+ reviews with 78% being 5star my wife and I gave it a shot. He’ll just send it back if it’s bad right? Laptop is brand spanking new with box shrink wrapped and how I know it’s new...”The apple stickers!” Not my first Mac book have a pro too but this is a great seller who has matured and listened to the community of reviews, and who is trying their best for us. Thank you guys perfect Christmas gift (early, month early ) for the wife
customer_reviews.author: Aa. Ron

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Warehouse Deal
customer_reviews.text: Got this from Amazon Warehouse listed in "acceptable" condition. This thing is damn near perfect! 0 cycles on the battery, still eligible for apple car and looks BRAND NEW. Even the cable had the little plastic covers on the ends. Only imperfection was a small dent on the bottom. Other than that, PERFECT. The laptop itself is classic Mac. Last year of the old version which was a great product. I expect this laptop to hold up as well as my daughters has.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Brand New & Warranty concerns
customer_reviews.text: I was too a bit skeptical to purchased based on some reviews regarding warranty period. But you do get a Brand new computer, Apple packaged and warranty is based on YOUR date of purchased. The release date of this Mac is mid 2017 and since the newer ones, 2018 are available, that may. E the only reason you pay $250 less than what Apple charges for it in its website. Go for it if you're looking at this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: C. Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Not an Apple fan
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an apple fan BUT this laptop is the best bang for the buck so it is now in my brief case. The weight, size, screen picture, battery life and price make it well worth the cost. I have bought 2 of this model MQD32LL/A so far and it is on the top of my buy list. Newer Air models have a little more power unfortunately have technical issues Apple hasn't fixed. Apple Technical suport deserves a one star as long as they continue to refuse to fix things, this is a reflection of service reviews and my battery replacements issues.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good machine
customer_reviews.text: I've had this computer for about 7 months now and haven't had any problems. This was my first Mac computer. I've previously bought Windows based machines. I'm impressed with the speed and portability of the unit. It replaced a 4 year old Lenovo Windows 7 machine that was upgraded to Windows 10 but reached the end of its usefulness and was very slow. My only complaint is Apple's lack of programs to interface with Microsoft Office programs. Just trying to view an excel CSV file is a nightmare and requires workarounds. I wish that aspect was easier but other than that, I'm satisfied. Battery life is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Peets104

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a great MacBook
customer_reviews.text: Product came brand new in box with everything included. Mac is really fast and there have been no hiccups with updates or importing things. Based on other reviews I called Apple to get the purchase date set for warranty purposes and they already had the date as the day I made the purchase. If you don’t HAVE to have all the bells and whistles that come on a new Mac (really it’s maybe two or three things different), then this will save you a good bit of money. My last MacBook lasted over ten years so here’s to hoping I have the same luck with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t beat this deal! I’ve had all apple products for years. I haven’t had a laptop in a while and had been thinking about getting one but just couldn’t justify the cost buying from apple at the time. Then I came across this deal and went for it even after some of the bad reviews. No complaints here! Received a brand new MacBook Air in original packaging. Works great! Super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: 😁😁😁
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous about purchasing this MacBook after reading some of the reviews. People were talking about having problems with the purchase date for the warranty, receiving an older model and some even said their’s was used. Luckily none of these were my experience. After receiving my MacBook I checked my serial number on the Apple website and everything turned out to be legit. I received a brand new 2017 model with a 1 year warranty from Apple. I was also able to purchase Apple care a month after I received the laptop. Im very happy with this purchase and if your debating on whether or not to buy one I’d say DO IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jk.07

customer_reviews.title: mostly good
customer_reviews.text: I've used a number of different macbooks through the years and I do like the form-factor of the macbook air. The 13" screen size is a good compromise on screen size and portability. I think the 11" screens are just too small. I prefer the 15" screen but I like the portability of this one. It's pretty light and easy to travel with. I would recommend getting more RAM and storage as those things can't be changed later on.
customer_reviews.author: Consumerist

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to use laptop
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never owned a Mac computer but my wife got this for me for Christmas. So far I’m impressed. It’s not the newest, fanciest model, but I don’t need that. It’s been easy to use. I can edit my kids videos they make for YouTube without issue. After doing some upgrades, I can now use my Apple Watch to unlock it, sync it with my phone, and more. On the negative side, I like to tinker with my electronics and in usual Apple fashion, I can’t do any upgrading of my own. That’s not a deal breaker for me, but it is a negative for a guy who used to build my own PCs from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Deuce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Received a brand new and sealed macbook air. So glad I made the switch from PC. This macbook air is light, portable and user friendly. Great for every day needs such as emails and browsing the web. Make sure when you are purchasing that you are selecting that it is ships from and sold by Amazon and NOT the marketplace sellers. This is how you know you will receive a brand new MacBook Air and are able to return it if you do not like it. Looks like a lot of people have been purchasing used MacBook Airs from marketplace sellers which is why they are having issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: battery charger stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I love Apple products and was excited about getting a new Macbook. I have had this for about four months now. I love the Macbook itself but the battery charger stopped working. There is no damage to the cord/battery pack. Every once in awhile the screen will also go black and I have to force shutdown to get it back up and running. This has happened about three times. I contacted support about this and they offered zero help. So while the price is great, I wish I had just spent the extra money and purchased directly from Apple. Too many issues for something I have had for such a short time and Amazon support doesn't help.
customer_reviews.author: miss sassypants

customer_reviews.title: Pos
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in December for a Christmas gift. It stopped working yesterday...the first day of home school. It won’t turn on. It’s no responsive to all button commands. And all the Apple stores are closed. So now my done is doing 6 hours of home school on a cell phone until this pos Can get fixed.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: I got a dud it would not even set up without freezing where the pad didn’t work and the keyboard is also ineffective. They want me to call Apple. So I am going to give them a call to see if they know how to do a reset under those circumstances. I am ready to mail it back. I can’t tell you what a huge disappointment and inconvenience this has been as well as a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: George O

customer_reviews.title: Not a current model.  I was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is an older macbook air. I thought I was buying a current model but this one is a few years old. I returned it and will buy the more expensive one once I get my refund. I wass really upset by this purchase. Avoid if you can. This is a very old Macbook Air. For 100 more you can get a current model. There is no finger print sensor or antything on this. Disappointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Running Shorts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what my boyfriend wanted! He had a crappy $250 PC laptop and it was just not good. He could barely run the internet and another program at the same time. For a few hundred more, we got him this one and ...well it's a Mac. What more is there! I've always been a Mac girl and now he's converted to the dark side with me! It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J

customer_reviews.title: get an affordable air with a good keyboard before Apple discontinues
customer_reviews.text: The display is a non-retina paltry 1440-by-900 pixels and it doesn't have all the bells and whistles of the latest Macbook Air or Pro, but what it does have are... - A keyboard that works. Once this model is gone, it will be a few years before Apple's entry level Air has a keyboard without issues. Even the high-end Air models do not yet have durable keyboards or keyboards with a good feel. - MagSafe charging. This is the end of the line for magsafe. Once this model is phased out, Airs will no longer have break-away charging connectors and durability may be of concern.
customer_reviews.author: MDS

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the premium prices any more
customer_reviews.text: I bought this new MacBook to replace my 11 year old MacBook Pro. I must say the quality of the new MacBooks has really gone down hill from my older one. Starting with the charger the older models have a magnetic connector that shows when charging, also it never gets broken just comes off if the cord is hit. The new models just have a cheeper feeling than the older ones. Even the Apple logo has gone cheap, it doesn’t even light up. Just two ports to plug into now. I’m returning it, I can’t justify the price now, Apple MacBooks are far from what they were in the past. Just Sad
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Like new in original box means brand new!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a like new MacBook air from amazon. It said it came in the original box and that was it. When I received it, the box was fully intact and still wrapped in the plastic from the factory. The computer was brand new! Someone must've returned it without even opening the box. On top of that the computer came with a Full one year warranty! I think I might've just lucked out. But I received a great computer for 250 dollars less than what they were selling the new ones. I'm happy I took the chance on a "used" MacBook Air from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item sent
customer_reviews.text: Received a blanket instead of laptop. Hopefully get actual laptop soon. Not happy at all since wife needed it as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: item does not work
customer_reviews.text: MacBook was used and doesn’t power on not charge. Paid for new and got a used non-functioning item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Fast!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new MacBook Air. It was brand-new and factory sealed right out of the box. Call Apple and they will update your warranty date to the day you purchased on Amazon and they verified my computer was new and made a few months ago. I did get Apple Care for a peace of mind and for any mishaps! Don't leave this item in your cart for weeks like me, I wished I would have purchased earlier!
customer_reviews.author: ACD97

customer_reviews.title: Slow, Low-Res, and Constant Notifications
customer_reviews.text: I don't think they are selling these new, they must be used or something. This is so slow and the resolution is noticeably less than other Macs (this resolution might be less than 720p). The laptop is so SLOW notifications and updates followed by even more notifications are never-ending. Buy from someone else please. Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with problems
customer_reviews.text: The first one come with problems, I just received a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo E. Santana

customer_reviews.title: Not enough bytes
customer_reviews.text: My much older MacBook was falling well behind the times, so I bought this one since the price was right. But: - its hard drive is far too small - it doesn’t have built-in DVD access that my old one did - it only has two USB ports (I use one for my mouse and the other for a one TB external SSD - which was also a “too small” choice) I did save money, but in hindsight I clearly shorted myself by “underbuying”. Technically it works but existentially and experientially it falls well short.
customer_reviews.author: j k colligan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for discounted price during Black Friday. Really loving the purchase!!!! It came brand new, sealed. I really like the 2017 version because it has all the needed ports unlike the new MacBooks they have.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Just for LOOKS
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot better laptops out there for the price that I paid for this one. I wanted to see what the hype was about. I've always been a windows based user. The apple interface is NOT user friendly. The processor is outdated, and it is overpriced! AND on top of that, it doesn't come in a touchscreen. After this, I am done with apple!
customer_reviews.author: Shantel

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good so far. Been using it a few days -- no issues. Checked warranty status; 90 days tech support and 1-year hardware and parts -- sounds right and I have no issue with that. If I find any problems, I will revise this review.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sardi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to try going back to Mac after endless frustration with a $300 PC laptop I bought for work. $300 PC = daily updates/huge waste of time during updates/simple apps 'breaking' after updates/having to figure out how to do things after each update...you know the drill. A few months ago Amazon lured me with an $800 deal on this discontinued Mac laptop, which was the last that had any USB ports-YAY! Soooo glad I went back to Mac. It was worth twice the price to me to walk away from all the PC mishigoss and just have the darn thing work without me having to triage update fallout or basically ever turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Schnauzer Lover

customer_reviews.title: Brand new!
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews I was skeptical about purchasing a device online. But this computer is brand new out of the box and I couldn't be happier. This is my first MacBook but I am definitely enjoying it. I am typically an Android user but the switch to apple hasn't been too complicated. I know there is a learning curve but so far so good. The computer is lightweight and for me thats a blessing and a curse cause sometimes I am a little rough. I will put on a good case and get Apple care for this product and I will be good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Tari L

customer_reviews.title: Recent build, full 3 year applecare
customer_reviews.text: I received mine on November 24, 2019. It had Mojave loaded. I updated to Catalina with no problem. I checked the applecare dates and my applecare ends 3 years after my purchase date. Very happy. I have a new computer with magsafe 2, and two USB ports. I understand the shift to USB-C, but I don't have to like it.
customer_reviews.author: yyz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It’s not retina and it’s not the newest model, but I love the price and the fact that it’s new out of the box. No one else used it and dropped it then tried to sell it on Craigslist. AppleCare won’t last for the full amount of time (read the reviews if this matters to you) but I never used AppleCare when we had it. This is a beautiful and smooth machine. I wish the screen was retina but I don’t think that’s worth double the cost 😆
customer_reviews.author: E. Sato

customer_reviews.title: Great deal a little older than stated.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a computer for quite some time. I had my heart set on a MacBook so I was so happy with the price point. I bounced back and forth with which one to buy. I pick this one because it was an older model and has some of the features I wanted the newer ones did not. That being said I had a hard time getting it to boot up. So had that I did have to call tech support. They were excellent. I came in the original box with everything that was expected to be there. The reason for the 4 stars not 5 is it was much older than stated.
customer_reviews.author: S. Young

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to invest in an Apple computer, I would seriously recommend spending the extra few hundred and buy it from a more reputable place like Apple itself. I had this computer for maybe a month or less and no damage was done to it but the screen glitched and completely stopped working. After taking it to a computer repair store, they told me it could not be fixed and it was a hardware/manufacturing issue. I had another friend with the exact same issue as well soon after. Amazon was nice enough to exchange it for me but I still would not recommend this computer. Look elsewhere if you're going to commit to an Apple computer.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Piazza

customer_reviews.title: I should’ve purchased it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I was one of those girls that got dissuaded by the more “tech savvy” men in her life from getting a MacBook. I can’t believe I listened. They would tell me it was too confusing too use... lies! Lol. It’s just like operating an iPhone, user friendly, simple, straight to the point. Love it. Use it for college work and browsing. I read other reviews and noticed they said it’s best to purchase from amazon directly instead of a third party so I did. Packaging was perfect. Product was brand new. It’s a very portable laptop with good battery life so far.
customer_reviews.author: A compulsive shopper

customer_reviews.title: An Inexpensive Never Used MacBook
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2017 No Touch ID model. I received an in-the-box, never opened MacBook with Mojave running on it out of the box. For the price, this is hard to beat! It upgraded to Catalina with no issues. If you're here, you know how awesome MacBooks are. If you're okay with an older model that still has excellent specs and is at an unbeatable price, this is what you're looking for! I can tell I'm going to have many years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: CatWorld

customer_reviews.title: good condition but kinda slow
customer_reviews.text: Due to the manufacture being from years ago, this mac system has slowed down. If you are looking for a mac to use for business purposes, I will recommend going for a mac book pro as it has a better computing power. I got this one as my younger brother wanted to use this just to browse videos over the internet. Satisfied with my buy out, but just letting you all know about this mac.
customer_reviews.author: Ritik

customer_reviews.title: Great Macbook
customer_reviews.text: When my daughter's old windows laptop died a few weeks ago, I begrudgingly agreed to get her a Macbook as she insisted that she needed one for making music (it certainly seems that Macs are best for this). This one came at a great price here and she is very happy with it. It is a great machine and while its likely not up to speed for everything, for her needs right now it is more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful computer.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my old MacBook Pro, this thing is so light and thin. Everything about it is fantastic, from the battery life to the screen quality. I was surprised that my old computers hard drive did not fit on this computer when I migrated it over. Its just too big. But then again cloud storage is much more prevalent now than it was in 2012 when I got my old MacBook. So I just got an external like an old man and said screw it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Wayne Tarlowski

customer_reviews.title: Great Price - Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Macbook Air so far! Easy to use and setup, lightweight, and works fast! Much lighter than my old PC Laptop. I spoke with apple care, and they sent me to a website to check warranty info: checkcoverage.apple.com. My warranty is in effect from when I purchased, not from when it was sold to Apple, as some other reviews have asked about. Definitely worth the price if you don't need the latest/greatest/newest computer.
customer_reviews.author: KatieP27

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition, keeps charge, slim and sleek, easy to take with you.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my husband and he loves it. It was much cheaper on Amazon than other places. We use it daily and several times a day. It’s perfect for school, shopping, networking, etc. It keeps up a pretty good battery life and is slim and easy to take with you. This is our first Macbook and I’m glad we picked this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal, bought this for the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at a pretty fair deal on Black Friday. I went with the 2017 model (rather than the newest model) because I didn't want the "butterfly" keyboard that everyone hates. Very happy with my purchase. Computer arrived sealed and brand new. Works perfectly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: FIT85

product_meta.title: Apple 13" MacBook Air Core i5 CPU, 8GB RAM (2017 Model 128GB)
feature_bullets: 1.8 GHz dual-core Intel Core i5 Processor
